directions: Working with several brine-cured olives at a time and using flat side of a large heavy knife, press olives to crush them and remove pits. Coarsely chop all olives and in a bowl toss with onion, oil, lemon juice, and capers. Relish may be prepared up to this point 2 days ahead and chilled, covered. Bring relish to room temperature before serving. Stir in parsley.
ingredients: 2 cups mixed brine-cured black and green olives
1/2 cup drained pimiento-stuffed green olives (about 3 ounces)
1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice, or to taste
1/3 cup finely chopped fresh flat-leafed parsley leaves
title: Mixed Olive Relish
